name: Space Keeper (Veronika23)
description:
Evil humanoid-pirates terrorize planets and steal resources. Help to restore order and save the planets. Play to unlock new levels and have fun.

Good luck!

How to play:

In each level, you need to fulfill the condition of the mission, in order to win you need the number of defense to be greater or equal to the number of enemies. Each unit performs a specific function:

Energy - the main resource allows you to build drones and defense

Drone - mine energy every 20 seconds

Defense - kill enemies in a ration of 1:1

For any questions or suggestions send email with subject "SpaceKeeper" to: veronikamart1994@gmail.com
